      • create

        public T create(ObjectLoader loader,
                Object config,
                URI base,
                ProgressMonitor progressMonitor,
                Marker marker)
         throws Exception
        This implementation casts config to the target type. It can be used where not special conversion is required, e.g. config is a String and feature type is String.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ObjectFactory<T>

      • isDefault

        public boolean isDefault()
        Specified by:
        isDefault in interface Feature<T>
        Returns:
        If true, this feature is loaded if FeatureObject configuration is not a map. E.g. HTTP call can be configured with just a URL string, i.e. URL is the default feature of HTTP Call.
